mapper.insert: insert into study (studyname, studystart, studyend, recruitend, personnel,skillstack,position,connection,onoff,content,state,viewcnt,regDate,createdBy) values (#{studyname}, #{studystart},#{studyend},#{recruitend},#{personnel},#{skillstack},#{position},#{connection},#{onoff},#{content},'apply',0,now(),#{createdBy})
mapper.update: update study set studyname = #{studyname}, studystart = #{studystart},studyend = #{studyend},recruitend = #{recruitend},personnel = #{personnel},skillstack = #{skillstack}, position = #{position},connection = #{connection},onoff = #{onoff},content = #{content}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate},modifiedBy = #{modifiedBy}) where id=#{id}
update study set state = #{state} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from study order by regDate desc
select * from study order by regDate desc limit 4
select position,count(*) as count from study where state='permit' group by position;
mapper.update: update study set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from study order by viewcnt desc limit 6;
select studyname from study where id = #{id}
